name: Slash with Ash
overview: A Halloween mini game released with the All Hallows' Eve pumpkin demo at the C64 Demo Competition at Zoo 2022. In it you wield the Homelite XL-12 chainsaw that replaces the hand you had to cut off to avoid it turning you evil. You must use it to block the horde of oncoming evil pumkins. Hail to the King, baby!
